thread.section_title: Grasscity Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Grasscity | www.grasscity.com
thread.title: Hybrid

author: Hybrid
title: Hybrid
text:
After ordering a glass pipe, and finding that it had been packaged improperly causing damage to the bowl in transit, I was fairly disappointed as this was my first experience with this company. However, they have certainly redeemed themselves.
Once I had contacted them explaining the issue as well as providing evidence that this certainly did occur, they immediately sent out two replacement bowls along with a pack of pipe screens. You cannot fault there customer care or responsiveness.
Other than this, their website is extremely easy to use and well designed, plus they have one of the best ranges of products I have seen.
Therefore I would/will be using their services again, and I would recommend them to anyone looking for any tobacco/smoking supplies.
